content.rendered:
Terms & Conditions

The terms and conditions stated here are a binding agreement between Win Big Money and its players. These conditions apply to your use of any of our systems and services we offer through any device or in person. By agreeing to these terms and condition you are waiving the right to pursue any class, group, or representative claim from past, present, or pending instances. 

You must read these terms and conditions in their entirety before accepting them upon creating an account. Our terms and conditions are linked to our Privacy policy, Rules and Guidelines, Disclosure statements, and other terms and notices posted on Win Big Money affiliated sites, communications, and in game activity. 

YOU ARE NOT REQUIRED TO APPLY REAL MONEY TO YOUR ACCOUNT to play our systems. Daily free entries are available upon request via Facebook messenger or via text at (361) 317-2653. Redemptions can be requested via Facebook messenger or via text at (361) 317-2653. Win Big Money redeems each player as promptly as possible. Technicalities can create delays in the redemption process. Redemptions are typically sent back through the same Cashtag used to apply the original donation. Other arrangements might have to be made between Win Big Money and the player requesting the redemption.

A valid state issued identification is required to sign up for an account with Win Big Money. Player must be a minimum of 18 years of age. All players must play responsibly. Playing systems can be addictive. School, employee, and prison identification will not be accepted to create an account. Player must submit a full picture of the entire ID. The picture must be clear and unaltered. For any reason, a Win Big Money team member can ask for a different picture of the ID provided. Expired and temporary identifications will not be accepted. You may not play any Win Big Money offered systems in the state of Washington, USA.

By agreeing to our terms and conditions you are agreeing that you are legally allowed to participate in the games and systems available through Win Big Money. It is the player’s responsibility to ensure that their participation is lawful at their current location and/or residence. 

You are responsible for claiming all winnings on your taxes. Tax forms are available upon request. Player redemption history available upon request. Win Big Money is not a financial institution. Win Big Money will not provide advice regarding finances, taxes, and/or legal matters.

You are responsible for keeping all account information up to date. Any changes in account information can be sent via Facebook messenger or via text at (361)317-2653. YOU ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR KEEPING YOUR ACCOUNT SAFE. Our systems offer password protection for security. We are not responsible for any activity by any other persons. If you suspect your account has been compromised, please contact us for a password change or new account. 

A win Big Money team member will notify players of important and useful information using the information on file. Notices regarding system changes, offers, promotions, giveaway winnings, bonus entries, cashtag changes, and operation changes will be sent to the player’s information on file. Winnings from giveaways must be claimed within 48hours of notice. 

Win Big Money has the right to deactivate or put a temporary hold on your account for the following reasons. 

  • Inactivity more than 12 months if the winnings are less than $10.
  • Inactivity more than 24 months if the winnings are more than $10. 
  • Temporary hold issued for multiple canceled donations amounting more than $50 in value. Failed donations will have to be zero balance before suspension is lifted.
  • Suspected illegal activity.
  • Temporary or permanent suspension is possible due to vulgar and harassing behavior towards any Win Big Money team member. At which time Win Big Money will contact the player using the information on file and notify the player of the decision and send the player any remaining entries on system accounts. 

Win Big Money members can close any accounts by contacting customer service via Facebook messenger or via text at (361) 317-2653

Win Big Money is not responsible for any loss of entries, bonuses, credits, spins or other in game comp/promo due to technical malfunction, political disturbance, service disruptions, lagging, glitching, or technical downtime. We are not responsible for viruses, Trojans, worms, logic bombs, spyware, malware, or any other similar technical issues that may happen to your device or game. Win Big Money is cannot be held responsible for any damage done to any device or incident while player is using a system, or anything related to Win Big Money. 

TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, UNDER NO CIRCUMSTANCES WILL WIN BIG MONEY OR OUR AFFILIATES, SUBSIDIARIES, PARTNERS, OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, EMPLOYEES, AGENTS, LICENSORS, SUBCONTRACTORS AND SUPPLIERS, BE RESPONSIBLE OR LIABLE TO YOU OR TO ANY OTHER ENTITY, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES, UNDER ANY LEGAL THEORY, WHETHER CONTRACT, TORT OR OTHERWISE, FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, INCLUDING ANY LOST PROFITS AND LOST BUSINESS OPPORTUNITIES, BUSINESS INTERRUPTION, LOST REVENUE, INCOME, POSSESIONS, GOODWILL, USE OF DATA OR OTHER INTANGIBLE LOSSES, IN EACH CASE THAT RESULT FROM OR RELATE IN ANY MANNER TO YOUR PARTICIPATION OR ANY OTHER ACT OR OMISSION BY US.
